languages.text: "Отставить! Отпустите его. Я не стану наказывать человека за минутную слабость после ужасной атаки, которую мы пережили".

traits.locale_text: "Отставить! Отпустите его. Я не стану наказывать человека за минутную слабость после ужасной атаки, которую мы пережили".

languages.text: "Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."
languages.original_text: "Отставить! Отпустите его. Я не стану наказывать человека за минутную слабость после ужасной атаки, которую мы пережили".

traits.locale_text: "Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."
"Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."
"Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."
"Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."

languages.text: “住手！放了他。看在我们遭受这么可怕的袭击的份上，我不打算因为某人一时软弱而惩罚他。”
languages.original_text: "Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."

traits.locale_text: “住手！放了他。看在我们遭受这么可怕的袭击的份上，我不打算因为某人一时软弱而惩罚他。”

languages.text: 「下がれ！彼を解放しろ。一時の弱さをもって、人を罰するつもりはない。我々が耐え忍んだ恐るべき攻撃の後ではなおさらだ」
languages.original_text: "Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."

traits.locale_text: 「下がれ！彼を解放しろ。一時の弱さをもって、人を罰するつもりはない。我々が耐え忍んだ恐るべき攻撃の後ではなおさらだ」

languages.text: "Zurück! Lasst ihn gehen. Ich werde niemanden für einen Augenblick der Schwäche bestrafen, nicht nach dem furchtbaren Angriff, den wir hinter uns haben."
languages.original_text: "Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."

traits.locale_text: "Zurück! Lasst ihn gehen. Ich werde niemanden für einen Augenblick der Schwäche bestrafen, nicht nach dem furchtbaren Angriff, den wir hinter uns haben."

languages.text: « Baissez vos armes ! Relâchez-le. Je ne punirai pas un homme pour un instant de faiblesse, pas après la terrible attaque que nous avons subie. »
languages.original_text: "Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."

traits.locale_text: « Baissez vos armes ! Relâchez-le. Je ne punirai pas un homme pour un instant de faiblesse, pas après la terrible attaque que nous avons subie. »

languages.text: «¡Alto! Libérelo. No tengo intención de castigar a un hombre por un momento de debilidad, especialmente tras el terrible ataque que hemos sufrido».
languages.original_text: "Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."

traits.locale_text: «¡Alto! Libérelo. No tengo intención de castigar a un hombre por un momento de debilidad, especialmente tras el terrible ataque que hemos sufrido».

languages.text: "Durun! Bırakın adamı. Göğüs gerdiğimiz korkunç saldırıdan sonra bir anlık zayıflık sergiledi diye kimseyi cezalandırmaya niyetim yok."
languages.original_text: "Stand down! Release him. I have no intention of punishing a man for a moment of weakness, not after the terrible attack we have endured."

traits.locale_text: "Durun! Bırakın adamı. Göğüs gerdiğimiz korkunç saldırıdan sonra bir anlık zayıflık sergiledi diye kimseyi cezalandırmaya niyetim yok."
